definition: to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

pinyin: hui1 fa1 xing4 cun2 chu3 qi4

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical composition of volatile oil from the leaves of Glycyrrhiza Inflata Batal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析胀果甘草叶的挥发性化学成分。

sentences.english: Chances are it contains phthalates and are out gassing chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它非常可能含有邻苯二甲酸盐，且正在挥发化学物。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ether soaking method can be used for the qualitative analysis of volatile oil from Lignum Santali.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚浸渍法可用于檀香挥发油的定性分析。

sentences.english: The research aimed to analyze the components and antibacterial activities of essential oils from Salvia plebeia R.
sentences.chinese: 分析荔枝草挥发油化学成分并对其抑菌活性进行研究。

sentences.english: So purification of less volatile components.
The volatile oils of Zanthoxylum schinifolium were extracted by water vapor distillation.
sentences.chinese: 采用水蒸气蒸馏法提取精制香椒子中的挥发油。

sentences.english: In recent years, many studies have been done in the essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 近年来关于香附的研究主要是挥发油。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the chemical components of the essential oil of Chimonanthus nitens Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨江西婺源产山蜡梅叶挥发油的化学成分。

sentences.english: The total amount of ammonia volatilization increased with the increase of phosphorus fertilizer application.
sentences.chinese: 氨挥发总量也随施磷量增加而增大。

sentences.english: New adhesives do not receive ITTF authorisation if they contain volatile organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 含挥发性有机溶剂的新胶水不能得到国际乒联的许可。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe method is stable, reliable and suitable for the volatile constituent analysis of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 结论该方法稳定可靠，适用于中药挥发性成分的分析。

sentences.english: A tool for programming non-volatile memories and other electrically-programmable devices.
sentences.chinese: 用来挥发内存和电可编程设备编程的工具。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the chemical constituents of essential oil from Sibiraea angustata (Rehd. ) Hand.
sentences.chinese: 目的对藏药柳茶的挥发油进行化学成分分析。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文对锌浸出渣挥发窑窑衬破损机理进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: Volatiles should not be added to the epoxies to improve their viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 不应将挥发物加到环氧树脂中去改善它们的粘性。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the chemical components in the volatile oil from the leaf of Epimedium wushanense T.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究巫山淫羊藿叶中挥发油的化学成分。

definition: to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
